xs:element.name: ReportColumnList
xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportColumn, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

xs:element.name: SubReportInformationList
xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportInformation, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

ReportTitle.StrSql: SELECT DEPT_CODE, ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN, EIGHT, OTHER, NVL(ONE,0)+ NVL(TWO,0)+ NVL(THREE,0)+NVL( FOUR,0)+NVL( FIVE,0)+NVL( SIX,0)+NVL( SEVEN,0)+NVL( EIGHT,0)+NVL( OTHER,0 ) HJ FROM (SELECT A.DEPT_NAME DEPT_CODE, case WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 60 THEN ' 小于1小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 120 THEN '1——2小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 180 THEN '2——3小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 240 THEN '3——4小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 300 THEN '4——5小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 360 THEN '5——6小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 420 THEN '6——7小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 480 THEN '7——8小时' ELSE '8小时以上' END SC, COUNT(*) SL FROM V_OPERATION_MASTER_V2 A WHERE A.OPER_STATUS_CODE > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >= :STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) GROUP BY A.DEPT_NAME , CASE WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 60 THEN ' 小于1小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 120 THEN '1——2小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 180 THEN '2——3小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 240 THEN '3——4小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 300 THEN '4——5小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 360 THEN '5——6小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 420 THEN '6——7小时' WHEN FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 480 THEN '7——8小时' ELSE '8小时以上' END ) PIVOT(SUM(SL) FOR SC IN(' 小于1小时' ONE, '1——2小时' TWO, '2——3小时' THREE, '3——4小时' FOUR, '4——5小时' FIVE, '5——6小时' SIX, '6——7小时' SEVEN, '7——8小时' EIGHT, '8小时以上' OTHER)) ORDER BY DEPT_CODE

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and a.dept_name = :VDEPTCODE

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and a.dept_name = :VDEPTCODE and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 60

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and a.dept_name = :VDEPTCODE and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) > 60 and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 120

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and a.dept_name = :VDEPTCODE and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) > 120 and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 180

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and a.dept_name = :VDEPTCODE and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) > 180 and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 240

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and a.dept_name = :VDEPTCODE and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) > 240 and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 300

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and a.dept_name = :VDEPTCODE and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) > 360 and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 420

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and a.dept_name = :VDEPTCODE and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) > 420 and FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME) <= 480
